Ui.Slider:
-- modified by jtbalogh
local parent = this:GetParent() parent:SetValue(parent:GetValue() - 1) PlaySound("UChatScrollButton")
local parent = this:GetParent() parent:SetValue(parent:GetValue() + 1) PlaySound("UChatScrollButton")
this:GetParent():SetVerticalScroll(arg1)
Ui.Button:
-- modified by jtbalogh
this:SetFrameLevel(this:GetFrameLevel() + 1);
this.Number = tonumber(string.sub(this:GetName(), string.len(this:GetName())-1)) -- assuming 2 digits if not this.Number then this.Number = tonumber(string.sub(this:GetName(), string.len(this:GetName()))) -- assuming one digit end
Outfitter_ListButton_OnClick(this);
Outfitter_ListButton_OnEnter(this)
Outfitter_ListButton_OnLeave(this)
local scrollbar = getglobal(this:GetParent():GetName().."ScrollFrameScrollBar") local scrollbarupbutton = getglobal(this:GetParent():GetName().."ScrollFrameScrollBarScrollUpButton") local scrollbardownbutton = getglobal(this:GetParent():GetName().."ScrollFrameScrollBarScrollDownButton") if not scrollbar:IsVisible() then elseif arg1 > 0 then -- up,down = 1,-1 local parent = scrollbarupbutton:GetParent() parent:SetValue(parent:GetValue() - 1) PlaySound("UChatScrollButton") else local parent = scrollbardownbutton:GetParent() parent:SetValue(parent:GetValue() + 1) PlaySound("UChatScrollButton") end Outfitter_ListButton_OnLeave(this) Outfitter_ListButton_OnEnter(this)

Frames.Frame:
-- modified by jtbalogh
-- size for 10 buttons
OutfitterFrame:Hide()
-- modified by jtbalogh
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText("", nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:Hide()
Frames.Button:
-- modified by jtbalogh
PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn"); Outfitter_ListButtonUp_OnClick()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText("", nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:Hide()

-- modified by jtbalogh
PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff"); Outfitter_ListButtonDown_OnClick()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText("", nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:Hide()
